Amazing

I'm sure this doesn't need to be said, but Half life 2 is a great game. It tells a amazing story with awesome gameplay and characters. My only complaint is that some of the vehicle levels feel a little too long, water hazard, highway 17, but other than that this game is possibly the holy grail of story based single player games. I could not recommend Half life 2 enough, especially with the unbeatable deal of the whole Half Life series, Portal series and some of the other valve games for $1 during the summer sale. Over all, I %100 recommend this game, 10/10, do buy.
Classic and timeless, Half Life 2 along with Episode 1 and 2 should be on the "mandatory games" for all the players.
игра очень крутая сюжет мне очень хорошо зашел прямо вах какая игра.

This game is a classic, and contains a very intriguing story that provokes thoughts of the unknown. Mixing both science and faith, into what is one of the most immersive FPS experiences, Half-Life 2 is a legendary work of art. If you are getting into this just now, you're in for a treat, just make sure to get the other parts, i.e. episode 1 and episode 2. This game has stuck with me throughout my life, I owe part of my general curiosity and caution of reality to this game.

J'ai tenté de me replonger dans des classiques pendant ce confinement, je suis allé au bout.
Effectivement, l'histoire, la direction artistique et l'ambiance valent le détour, mais certaines mécaniques du jeu ont selon moi plutôt mal vieilli.
1 - Les chargements très régulier entre les différentes zones (on en a plus vraiment l'habitude en 2020)
2 - Trop de moment clé / fin de niveau où cela conciste à [spoiler]bien viser avec son lance-roquette / courir / le recharger / recommencer[/spoiler]
3 - La conduite des véhicules hasardeuse et [spoiler] les parcours qui manque un peu d'intérêt [/spoiler]

Bref, je recommande 6/10 quand même car le jeu reste très bien construit mais il a fallu un peu (trop) tirer sur la fibre nostalgique pour certains moments. Si vous me lisez et que vous avez moins de temps à consacrer, optez pour Portal 2 / L4D2 de Valve également qui ont bien mieux passé l'épreuve du temps.

Do you really need a review of Half Life 2? It's like reviewing oxygen, "7/10, couldnt really taste it but it gives me life so pretty cool overall". Half Life 2 is essential and almost everyone on the planet has played it. So instead i'll give you a review of Cats the movie:

Like staring into some kind of furvert abyss, this unholy stain on cinema will stare back into your soul and haunt you long after you finish watching it. This sight of a naked furry Idris Elba means i will never be able to successfully maintain an erection for the rest of my life. 0/10
